name: v1_trivia
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool trivia_by_api_ninjas.
Tool description: Access endless trivia question and answers. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/trivia.
API description: Fetches trivia questions from the API Ninjas Trivia API endpoint.

limit.description: The number of trivia questions to return. Must be between 1 and 30. Default is 1.

category.description:
Category of trivia. Possible values are: 

**artliterature
language
sciencenature
general
fooddrink
peopleplaces
geography
historyholidays
entertainment
toysgames
music
mathematics
religionmythology
sportsleisure**
